description:
Masaki Funaho Jurai is a first empress of the planet Jurai.
She is Masaki Azusa Jurai`s first wife, and the mother of Yosho. She also serves as Jurai`s Minister of Intelligence, and sees right through Yosho`s Katsuhito disguise. She is a distant descendant of Masaki, the sister of the first ruler of Jurai, but considers herself to be human since she was born on Earth.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Masaki Funaho Jurai
